original: so tattha dukkhā tibbā kaṭukā vedanā vedeti;

bhikkhave niraya pālā sa vesetvā kuṭhārīhi tacchanti pe

original: tamenaṁ, bhikkhave, nirayapālā uddhampādaṁ adhosiraṁ ṭhapetvā vāsīhi tacchanti …pe…
analyzed: bhikkhave niraya pālāḥ uddhampādam adhosiram ṭhapetvā vāsīhi tacchanti pe

original: tamenaṁ, bhikkhave, nirayapālā rathe yojetvā ādittāya pathaviyā sampajjalitāya sajotibhūtāya sārentipi paccāsārentipi …pe…
analyzed: bhikkhave niraya pālāḥ rathe yojetvā ādittāya pathaviyā sampajjalitāya sajoti bhūtāya sārenti pi paccāsārenti pi pe

original: tamenaṁ, bhikkhave, nirayapālā mahantaṁ aṅgārapabbataṁ ādittaṁ sampajjalitaṁ sajotibhūtaṁ āropentipi oropentipi …pe…
analyzed: bhikkhave niraya pālāḥ mahantam aṅgāra pabbataṃ ādittam sampajjalitam sajoti bhūtam āropenti pi oropenti pi pe

original: tamenaṁ, bhikkhave, nirayapālā uddhampādaṁ adhosiraṁ gahetvā tattāya lohakumbhiyā pakkhipanti ādittāya sampajjalitāya sajotibhūtāya.

original: So tattha pheṇuddehakaṁ paccati, so tattha pheṇuddehakaṁ paccamāno sakimpi uddhaṁ gacchati, sakimpi adho gacchati, sakimpi tiriyaṁ gacchati.
analyzed: so tattha pheṇuddehakam paccati saḥ tattha pheṇuddehakam paccamāno sakimpi uddham gacchati sakimpi adhas gacchati sakimpi tiriyam gacchati

original: So tattha dukkhā tibbā kaṭukā vedanā vedayati, na ca tāva kālaṁ karoti yāva na taṁ pāpakammaṁ byantīhoti.
analyzed: saḥ tattha dukkhā tibbā kaṭukā vedanāḥ vedayati na ca tāva kālam karoti yāva na tam pāpa kammam byantīhoti
tena hi atthi nirayesu niraya pālā ati
